author: Kenny Klein
description: Reminiscent of an Espresso Martini but with raisiny fruit and distinctive gentiane bitterness. A great after dinner sipper but don't let that stop you enjoying this complex cocktail as an aperitif.
name: Curiosity
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
